item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Thalia
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.

item.title: Serginho Groisman
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Imagine all the people living life in peace. You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us, and the world will be as one.

item.title: Ronaldinho Gaúcho
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The most important thing for us is to realize that last season is over and this one is completely different. And that if we don't run or battle until the end we won't win anything.

item.title: Common White Girl
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Life is full of beauty. Notice it. Notice the bumble bee, the small child, and the smiling faces. Smell the rain, and feel the wind. Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.

item.title: Travie McCoy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: I'm fragile from girls in the past that did nothing but frontin and greasy on me but I can tell that you different, swagger brand new like an infant.

item.title: Anderson Cooper
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: I suppose if you've never bitten your nails, there isn't any way to explain the habit. It's not enjoyable, really, but there is a certain satisfaction - pride in a job well done.

item.title: Leonardo DiCaprio
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The best thing about acting is that I get to lose myself in another character and actually get paid for it... It's a great outlet. I'm not really sure who I am - it seems I change every day.

item.title: Bill Gates
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: I really had a lot of dreams when I was a kid, and I think a great deal of that grew out of the fact that I had a chance to read a lot.

item.title: Akshay Kumar
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: I see the friends I made over the years who have become family today, people I became acquainted with who have achieved so much in their lives. They taught me something with each meeting.

item.title: Steve Jobs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Everything around you that you call life was made up by people that were no smarter than you, and you can change it, you can influence it, you can build your own things that other people can use.
